structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Education Sub-Level Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Detailed classification of education sub-levels following Greek educational system standards.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Primary education - Year 1
structure:Code.common:Description: First year of primary education (6-7 years old).

structure:Code.common:Name: Primary education - Year 2
structure:Code.common:Description: Second year of primary education (7-8 years old).

structure:Code.common:Name: Primary education - Year 3
structure:Code.common:Description: Third year of primary education (8-9 years old).

structure:Code.common:Name: Primary education - Year 4
structure:Code.common:Description: Fourth year of primary education (9-10 years old).

structure:Code.common:Name: Primary education - Year 7
structure:Code.common:Description: Seventh year of primary education (12-13 years old).

structure:Code.common:Name: Post-secondary vocational education
structure:Code.common:Description: Post-secondary non-tertiary vocational education and training.

structure:Code.common:Name: University degree
structure:Code.common:Description: Bachelor's degree or equivalent university qualification.

structure:Code.common:Name: Postgraduate degrees (Master's/PhD)
structure:Code.common:Description: Master's degree, PhD, or other postgraduate qualifications.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other education levels
structure:Code.common:Description: Other education levels not specifically classified above.
